ai-tika-vin11t9:1_1: When a monk has experiential confidence in the presence of the monks, he thus addressed the nuns: “Afterwards, the funeral pyresumes, and uses that what is to be fitting as an expert in the Discourse on the Collections of the Eights, and then they show it to the nun Commentaries.”
ai-tika-vin11t9:1_2: it is mentioned here in the Commentaries.
ai-tika-vin11t9:1_3: “Through wretched” is said: “This is meant by this,
ai-tika-vin11t9:1_4: should be known: “This is the meaning of this kind of person.”
